content: As the years progressed, Newton completed his work on universal gravitation, diffraction of light, centrifugal force, centripetal force, inverse-square law, bodies in motion and the variations in tides due to gravity.
translations: ita:Col passare degli anni, Newton complet√≤ i suoi lavori sulla gravitazione universale, diffrazione della luce, forza centr
